name: Mr. Mint
description: What Is MNT? Mr. Mint is an asset-backed token. It integrates aspects of cryptocurrency mining technologies, multi-utility NFTs, and P2E gaming in the Metaverse and Web 3.0. Listed on Coinstore, BSC Scan, and Binance Smart Chain, Mr. Mint’s revenue model is focused on sustainable energy and lower costs. Through low-cost and sustainable energy, they currently utilize electric power to operate the largest crypto farms that offer services for cryptocurrency mining. They have four mining farms with a total capacity of 2 MW and a total area of 50,500 sq. ft. The mining farms are operated at full capacity today. These farms are located in a region with the lowest electricity costs. The cold environment with an annual average temperature of 20°C, or 68.4°F, allows additional savings on cooling the equipment hosted at the center.
